column1: This #SmallBusinessSaturday means so much to the Pennsylvania workers entrepreneurs and small businesses of our community. Please join me in supporting these neighbors today and throughout the holiday season.

Today Americans have much for which to give thanks and I encourage you to take a moment to reflect on the many blessings that we enjoy as a nation.  However you are celebrating today Alice and I wish you and your family a happy safe and healthy Thanksgiving. #HappyThanksgiving https://t.co/X8kuagZQWR

Small businesses are not only the backbone of our economy - they are the heart of our community.  On #SmallBusinessSaturday and into the holiday season please join me in ”shopping small.” #shopsmall https://t.co/n7cZxfCeX5

Thanks to our health care heroes and #OperationWarpSpeed America is positioned to develop and distribute a safe & effective COVID-19 vaccine more efficiently than any other country.   The promise of American innovation brings hope to the horizon. https://t.co/Z8169YXAJk

This INCREDIBLE progress on a COVID-19 vaccine is a testament to the promise of American innovation. And thanks to #OperationWarpSpeed our nation is equipped to distribute a SAFE and EFFECTIVE vaccine to communities as soon as it is cleared. https://t.co/qaF9nFOG8F

On #RuralHealthDay I reaffirm my commitment to strengthening Pennsylvanians' access to quality & affordable health care - from renewing the pipeline of doctors entering rural communities with the Homegrown Health Care Initiative to expanding access to reliable broadband. https://t.co/rfpF8u89pk

Congratulations to @GOPLeader McCarthy Whip @SteveScalise @HouseGOP Chair @RepLizCheney Policy Chair @USRepGaryPalmer  House GOP Vice-Chair @RepMikeJohnson & House GOP Secretary @RepRichHudson - and thank you for your willingness to lead our Conference in the 117th Congress.

As small businesses struggle nearly $138 BILLION of Paycheck Protection Program funding remains unspent. House Democrats have blocked key aid for American workers & small businesses 40+ times.  #LetsWork to deliver relief to these hardworking Americans and rebuild our economy. https://t.co/nNXo4JS3KN

Today Moderna announced that its #COVID19 vaccine is nearly 95% effective. This incredible progress is a testament to American innovation.   Thanks to #OperationWarpSpeed America is better positioned to distribute a safe & effective vaccine than any other country in the world. https://t.co/Fq3ScC3W47
Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine is 94.5% effective in late-stage trials - incredible progress.   Thanks to Americans' cutting-edge innovation there is hope on the horizon. https://t.co/msp0anLMTB
Sending prayers and best wishes for a speedy recovery to the Dean of the House. https://t.co/Ecps9WGk3w

On #VeteransDay Americans honor the brave men and women who have worn our country’s uniform and we give thanks for their courageous leadership. Our veterans have served and sacrificed for our freedom - they are truly the best of America and we are indebted to them. https://t.co/pq596THfB4
Thank you to the brave men and women of @USMC for 245 years of service and excellence. #marinecorpsbirthday https://t.co/jcNgMWEISv

Proud to announce that @PennDOTNews has awarded $6M to the Rte. 219 project to create planning & engineering documents - a key step in the work to complete the final 5.5 miles. This important project will advance economic opportunities in our region and make our roads safer.
This encouraging news is a testament to the promise of American drive and innovation. We will defeat the COVID-19 virus. https://t.co/YE3Pwp6EFe

Pennsylvanians expect a free & fair election - and Pennsylvanians DESERVE a free & fair election.   The PA Republican Congressional delegation is demanding that Gov. Wolf and his admin follow the law and ensure that every legal ballot is counted once. https://t.co/3Dw4rrOIxm https://t.co/yZO2xJVIlu

We must ensure that our election is fair free safe secure legitimate – and transparent.   I’m calling on AG Barr & DOJ to safeguard the integrity of the election and ensure that every American’s legally-cast ballot is counted once.   See more: https://t.co/SudVcTe8zg https://t.co/qXqqdp9Vus
It is an honor to represent my fellow Pennsylvanians in the U.S. House of Representatives and I look forward to serving as your voice in the 117th Congress.

Small businesses are not only the backbone of our economy they are the heart of the community. Recently I had a great visit to Windy Knoll Farm Market & Creamery in Chambersburg. I’ll keep fighting to support our workers & entrepreneurs as they weather this storm. https://t.co/7zZXBRfNcM

Republicans in Congress have made a #CommitmentToAmerica. We will:   🇺🇸 Restore our American values.  🇺🇸 Rebuild the great economy. 🇺🇸 Renew the American dream for generations to come.   America’s brightest days are still ahead.

With record-setting GDP growth our economic recovery continues to shatter expectations and deliver results for Americans.  President @realDonaldTrump & Republicans built the world's greatest economy - and we're going to do it again. This is the road to a #GreatAmericanComeback.

Washington Democrats’ energy promises would kill thousands of Pennsylvanians’ jobs raise energy prices for hardworking families hurt our economy and end our energy independence.  The people of Pennsylvania are listening. https://t.co/LIwT5Ojars

Justice Amy Coney Barrett is an exceptional and supremely-qualified jurist who has proven before the American people that she will uphold the U.S. Constitution and interpret the law as it is written. She will be an outstanding addition to #SCOTUS. https://t.co/5qBFtgpArA

By properly disposing of unused or unwanted medications you can keep them from reaching the wrong hands - preventing drug addiction and overdose deaths.   On #TakeBackDay clean out your medicine cabinet and find the closest collection site to you: https://t.co/LJwatx9TlN https://t.co/V1CDBoMZeJ

Today in Bedford County I met with workers at Mission Critical Solutions which specializes in metal fabrication and manufacturing services. Our region’s highly skilled workforce is an incredible benefit to our community and local economy. https://t.co/qpp12MAY67

.@POTUS is delivering on his promises to Pennsylvania’s frackers farmers miners and steelworkers. President @realDonaldTrump’s “all job creation is local” approach is growing our economy supporting our workforce and creating American jobs for American workers. https://t.co/eWO3vZ4ntg
#ConfirmACB https://t.co/hddo34ozbE

It's time to #ConfirmACB. https://t.co/3h0VPyBaFe

As a nation we will defeat the coronavirus and rebuild the greatest economy. #CommitmentToAmerica https://t.co/98NKmRi17a

We have realistic solutions to secure our medical supply chain & ensure that Americans are never beholden to the #CCP for medicines and health care supplies. https://t.co/VmeiEz0NC6

The #ChinaTaskForce released our report with 400+ achievable solutions to counter the growing threat of the #CCP. From securing the medical supply chain to combating interference in our institutions we must equip America to lead in the 21st century. More: https://t.co/3wa4ppFLz8 https://t.co/uxp9dcs2Wb

Judge Amy Coney Barrett is a qualified jurist and principled originalist who has a proven record of upholding the U.S. Constitution. I urge the Senate to follow historical precedent and ensure that this #SCOTUS nominee receives just consideration. https://t.co/owJc7l8tJK

This morning I was proud to sign Rep. @HerreraBeutler's discharge petition to force a vote on legislation that would extend the #PaycheckProtectionProgram and offer security - and hope - to American workers & families.   Livelihoods are on the line. We must #FightForSmallBiz! https://t.co/XeaLMq7tf0

This #SmallBusinessWeek livelihoods are on the line. The deadline to apply for #PaycheckProtectionProgram support has passed yet nearly $138B remains unspent. We cannot allow families on Main Street to be used as bargaining chips in DC. Congress must extend this lifeline. https://t.co/65E3hGze5x

We have made a #CommitmentToAmerica - Republicans will RESTORE our way of life REBUILD our economy and RENEW the American dream for generations to come.   The contrast is clear. https://t.co/JazBiZA6Yq
